import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../App.css'; import { Accordion, InputGroup, FormControl, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import timetable_data from '../data/timetable'; const Search = () => { const [buttonOn, setButtonState] = useState(false); const [tt_num, setTt_num] = useState(''); const [subject_name, setSubject_name] = useState(''); const [previous, setPrevious] = useState(false); const [after, setAfter] = useState(false); const [year, setYear] = useState(false); const [filtered, setFiltered] = useState([]); const data = timetable_data; const change = () => { setFiltered(data.filter(tt_filter => { return tt_filter.tt_num === tt_num })); } return (
{ setTt_num(e.target.value); change(); }} value={tt_num} type="tel"> G
{ setSubject_name(e.target.value); change(); }} value={subject_name}>
{ setPrevious(previous => !previous); change(); }} /> { setAfter(after => !after); change(); }} /> { setYear(year => !year); change(); }} />

); }; export default Search;
